page.title: 07SUBURBAN FAMILY LIFE
page.content: MR.& MRS.SMITH AND THEIR THREE DAUGHTERS ARE A TYPICAL FAMILY IN THIS AREA.THEY LIVE IN A THREE BEDROOMED SEMI-DETATCHED HOUSE WITH ONE BATHROOM,CENTRAL HEATING,A SMALL GARDEN AND A GARAGE.THEY HAVE ONE CAR. THEY HAVE FRUIT JUICE,CEREAL,TOAST AND TEA FOR BREAKFAST,A SNACK LUNCH AND A COOKED MEAL OF MEAT AND VEGETABLES AT NIGHT. MR.SMITH WORKS LOCALLY AS A PAINTER AND DECORATOR AND MRS.SMITH HAS A PART-TIME JOB IN A LOCAL SHOP. THEIR CHILDREN ATTEND THE LOCAL COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOL.THEY SHOP AT TESCO,A SUPERMARKET IN CHESTER,BUT BUY IMMEDIATE NEEDS AT THE LOCAL KINGSWAY SHOPS.MILK,NEWSPAPERS AND LETTERS ARE DELIVERED DAILY.FOR ENTERTAINMENT THEY WATCH TELEVISION AND VIDEO. BOTH PARENTS ENJOY GARDENING.THEY GET ON WELL WITH THEIR NEIGHBOURS AND SOMETIMES ASK THEM IN FOR A PARTY.
